snippet.title: The Legend of Korra Video Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
In The Legend of Korra video game, an ancient evil force has emerged from the portals and threatens the balance of both worlds!  Only the Avatar stands a chance in defeating this new threat! 

© 2014 Viacom International Inc. All rights reserved. Nickelodeon, Legend of Korra and all related titles, logos and characters are trademarks of Viacom International Inc.  Game © 2014 Activision Publishing, Inc. ACTIVISION is a registered trademark of Activision Publishing, Inc. All rights reserved. Opening the game box and using the software constitutes acceptance of the Software License Agreement available at support.activision.com/license. ESRB rating icons are registered trademarks of the Entertainment Software Association (ESA) and may not be used without permission of the ESA. All other trademarks and trade names are the properties of their respective owners.
